sentences.en: A British merchant cruiser had been sunk by German battle cruisers.
sentences.cn: 一艘英国商业舰艇被德国的巡洋战舰击沉了.

sentences.en: A typical cruiser or aircraft carrier may well be an easy target.
sentences.cn: 标准的巡洋舰或航空母舰是一种容易被击中的目标.

sentences.en: He could not face our cruiser forces.
sentences.cn: 他不能和我们的巡洋舰交手.

sentences.en: He said the KGB got advance warning of Grabbe's mission against the cruiser Ordzhonikidze.
sentences.cn: 他说,克格勃事先得到了报告,获悉克雷布要对“奥尔忠尼启则号”巡洋舰采取行动.

sentences.en: He trained them on the cruiser.
It is the biggest cruiser ever built for the Royal Navy.
sentences.cn: 它是皇家海军迄今为止建造的最大的一艘巡洋舰.

sentences.en: Some nasty man shoved him and his police cruiser into the East River.
sentences.cn: 有些坏人把他和他的警车推进东边河.

sentences.en: The army dispatched a cruiser to the island to restore order.
sentences.cn: 部队派一艘巡洋舰至该岛以恢复秩序.

sentences.en: The arrival of this eight - inch - gun cruiser restored to its narrow balance a doubtful situation.
sentences.cn: 这艘八寸口径大炮的巡洋舰的来到,使一种不定的局势,又勉强地恢复了平衡.

sentences.en: The cruiser knifed through the heavy sea.
sentences.cn: 巡洋舰穿过汹涌的大海.
这艘巡洋舰有坚固的装甲。

sentences.en: The cruiser was surrounded by the enemy.
sentences.cn: 这艘巡洋舰被敌军包围了.

sentences.en: They travelled to Portsmouth, where they embarked on the battle cruiser HMS Renown.
sentences.cn: 他们行至朴次茅斯，在那里登上了英国皇家海军“声望号”战列巡洋舰。

sentences.en: We made a cruiser in the distance.
sentences.cn: 我们看见远处有一艘巡洋舰.⑵⑽(纸牌中)洗(牌);打满(叫牌数);出( 牌 )胜一圈;胜(一圈)⑵

trans.tran_cn: 巡洋舰，舱式游艇，巡逻警车
trans.tran_en: a large fast ship used by the navy
